answers.answer: It could be a simple Catarack.Or you could be going blind from a vitamin overdose.

question: i have cloudy vision in my right eye. i have had this for a few weeks now. i thought it was my new glasses that i bought,but discovered this morning that i have it with my glasses off. i have emphysema and my father had diabetes in his later years. i dont have any sugar problems that i am aware of,just not sure what to do about it.
title: cloudy vision in right eye
